original: Åhlund, Nils Jonas, disponent, Göteborg, f. 28/1/97 i Gbg av överste Gustaf Å. o. Sigrid Kjellberg. G. 21 m. Ulla Wilkens. Barn: Inga f. 22, g. Philipson, Margareta 23, g. Lothigius. — Stud:ex. 14, res:off:ex. 16, ekon. ex. v. hand :höigsk, i Sthlm 19. Res. t. Engl., Tyskl., Frankr., Ungern, HolL, Belg. o. USA 23-48. Tj :m:an i Esselte 19-20’, kont:chef i Sthlms Kartong- & Litogr. A-B 20-22, dir:assist. i Esselte 22-27, disp. i Sv. Bokhand :centr. 27-31, i Esseke 31-40’ verkst. dir. i Bengtsons LitOigr. A-B 38-40, i Esseltes Gbgsind. A-B, Gustaf Melins A-B, Wezäta-Gbgslitogr. A-B o. A-B Esselte Kartonnage i Gbg sed. 40. Ordf. i styr. f. Hugo Brusewitz A-B, A-B Borås Tryckeri & Kartongfabr., A-B Konsumenttjänst, Gbgs reklamfören. 42, Sv. boktr:fören. o. Sv. boktr:-fören. kreditkassa, led. av styr. f. Gbgs högerförb.. Sv. reklamförb., Bo-husl. företagarefören. (suppl.), Philip Holmqvists hand:inst., Gbgs boktr:-fören., Sv:es tr>xk. arb :giv :förb., Sv:es bokbinderiidk. arb :giv :förb., 167/ Gbgs ’konserthus, Sv. reklam- o. försäljn :kont., suppl. i styr. f. Företagsekon. fören. o. Sv:es grafiska indiförb., fullm. i Gbgs hand:-kamm., led. av styr. f. Grafiska inst., led. av Int. boktr :rådet o. Nord. boktr :rådet, v. ordf. i Sv. lawn-tennisförb. 41-44. Sv. mäst. i lawn-tennis 18. Skr.: Boktryckeriets administration (i Hantv. bok), art. i fackfrågor. GV:sJmt, RVO, Sv. gymn:-o. idrifören. riksförb. ftjt., Sv. lawn-tennisförb. ftj :plak.
translated: Åhlund, Nils Jonas, manager, Gothenburg, b. 28/1/97 in Gothenburg, son of Colonel Gustaf Å. and Sigrid Kjellberg. Married on 21, married to Ulla Wilkens. Children: Inga b. 22, married to Philipson, Margareta b. 23, married to Lothigius. — Secondary school diploma 14, reserve officer's exam 16, business economics degree from the College of Commerce in Stockholm 19. Traveled to England, Germany, France, Hungary, the Netherlands, Belgium, and the USA from 23-48. Employed at Esselte 19-20, head of administration at Stockholm's Carton & Lithography Co. 20-22, assistant director at Esselte 22-27, manager at the Swedish Book Trade Center 27-31, director of Bengtsons Lithography Co. 38-40, and in Esselte's Gothenburg Industries Co., Gustaf Melins Co., Wezäta-Gothenburg Lithography Co., and Esselte Cartonnage Co. in Gothenburg since 40. Chairman of the board for Hugo Brusewitz Co., Borås Printing and Carton Factory Co., Consumer Services Co., Gothenburg Advertising Association 42, Swedish Printing Association, and Swedish Printing Association Credit Fund, member of the board for Gothenburg Conservative Association, Swedish Advertising Association, Bohuslän Entrepreneurs' Association (suppl.), Philip Holmqvist's Commercial Institute, Gothenburg Printing Association, Swedish Printing Employers' Federation, Swedish Bookbinding Employers' Federation, Gothenburg Concert Hall, Swedish Advertising and Sales Corporation, deputy in the board for Swedish Business Economics Association and Swedish Graphic Industry Association, representative in Gothenburg Chamber of Commerce, member of the board for Graphic Institute, and member of International Printing Council and Nordic Printing Council, vice chairman of Swedish Lawn Tennis Association 41-44. Swedish lawn tennis champion 18. Publications: "The Administration of Printing" (in Handicrafts Book), articles on professional matters. Order of the Polar Star with Crossed Swords, Order of Vasa, Swedish Gymnastics and Sports Federation silver medal, Swedish Lawn Tennis Association gold plaque.
